title: IDatumTag.SetText
description: Sets the text of this datum tag.
signature:
System.Boolean SetText( 
   System.Int32
WhichText
,
   System.String
Text
)

parameters.name: WhichText
parameters.description: Text to set as defined in swDatumTagTextParts_e

parameters.name: Text
parameters.description: New content for the specified WhichText

returns: True if successful, false if not
remarks:
After calling this method, call
IModelView::GraphicsRedraw
to see the new text.
